item.title: Six Months with Nikon D7100
item.author: mail@tahirhashmi.com (Tahir Hashmi)
item.description: It’s been more than six months since I have had a Nikon D7100 for my own and I have been thinking of writing down my thoughts about the camera. However, these six months with the camera have been a bit of an up-and-down journey and it’s only now that I feel like I know the camera enough to write about it. The D7100 is an enthusiasts’ camera and it will make you earn that title before you can be get along with it.
